name: Experiment J-SE
description:
as a team, this is one of the projects we made during the first half of 2020. due to the pandemic we couldn't do much properly due to lack of communication. but it was fun either way

The game itself is in spanish due to the instructions given to us. 

-------------------

Controls:

You play the prototype with the mouse.

Left Click: Whip attack.

Right click: Shoot slimeball

Scroll: change element

Mouse:  control the reticle.

--------------

Graphical aspects: Barbara Castillo

Programming: Tomás "Nebby" Guerrero

QA & Coordination: Ricardo Polanco
